title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 372.5 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 372.5 - Application

State Regulations
(a) An application
for emergency assistance to needy families with children, made by an individual
family not currently in receipt of public assistance, shall be recorded on the

State- prescribed form. For a family currently in receipt of public assistance, no additional application is required. (b) When emergency assistance is required on
a mass basis, names of families requesting such assistance recorded on form
DSS-880, Register of Application and Authorization for Emergency Assistance, shall constitute their application. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
372.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
